== Shotwell Photo Manager ==

=== Introduction ===
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:right; font-size: 0.9em; width:40%; background:#F1F1ED; margin: 0 0 1em 1em;" style="padding:0.5em;"><<BR>>
|}

Shotwell is a photo organizer for the GNOME desktop environment. It lets you import photos from disk or camera, organize and view them in various ways, and export them to share with others. It is the default photo manager in Ubuntu starting with Ubuntu 10.10 (Maverick Meerkat).

=== Using Shotwell ===
Please see the <nowiki>[[http://shotwell-project.org/doc/html/|User's Guide]]</nowiki> on the official Shotwell home page for a detailed explanation on the usage of Shotwell Photo Manager.

=== External Links ===

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Shotwell|Home Page]]</nowiki> - Official Shotwell Photo Manager home page
